BindableList(IEnumerable<T>)

Creates a new BindableList<T>, optionally adding the items of the given collection.

public BindableList(IEnumerable<T> items = null)

Parameters

items IEnumerable<T>

The items that are going to be contained in the newly created BindableList<T>.

Properties

BindTarget

An alias of BindTo(BindableList<T>) provided for use in object initializer scenarios. Passes the provided value as the foreign (more permanent) bindable.

public IBindableList<T> BindTarget { set; }

The description for this object.

public string Description { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Disabled

Whether this BindableList<T> has been disabled. When disabled, attempting to change the contents of this BindableList<T> will result in an InvalidOperationException.

public bool Disabled { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Check whether this object has its default value.

BindCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler, bool)

Bind an action to CollectionChanged with the option of running the bound action once immediately with an Add event for the entire contents of this BindableList<T>.

public void BindCollectionChanged(NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler onChange, bool runOnceImmediately = false)

Parameters

onChange NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler

The action to perform when this BindableList<T> changes.

runOnceImmediately bool

Whether the action provided in onChange should be run once immediately.

BindDisabledChanged(Action<bool>, bool)

Bind an action to DisabledChanged with the option of running the bound action once immediately.

public void BindDisabledChanged(Action<bool> onChange, bool runOnceImmediately = false)

Parameters

onChange Action<bool>

The action to perform when Disabled changes.

runOnceImmediately bool

Whether the action provided in onChange should be run once immediately.

CreateInstance()

Creates a new instance of this IBindable for use in GetBoundCopy(). The returned instance must have match the most derived type of the bindable class this method is implemented on.

protected virtual BindableList<T> CreateInstance()

Returns

BindableList<T>

GetBoundCopy()

Retrieve a new bindable instance weakly bound to the configuration backing. If you are further binding to events of a bindable retrieved using this method, ensure to hold a local reference.

public BindableList<T> GetBoundCopy()

Returns

BindableList<T>

A weakly bound copy of the specified bindable.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown when attempting to instantiate a copy bindable that's not matching the original's type.

Parse(object, IFormatProvider)

Parse an object into this instance. A collection holding items of type T can be parsed. Null results in an empty BindableList<T>.

public void Parse(object input, IFormatProvider provider)

Parameters

input object

The input which is to be parsed.

provider IFormatProvider

Not valid for BindableList<T>.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if this BindableList<T> is Disabled.

UnbindFrom(IUnbindable)

Unbinds ourselves from another IBindable such that we stop receiving updates it. The other IBindable will also stop receiving any events from us.

public virtual void UnbindFrom(IUnbindable them)

Parameters

them IUnbindable

An event which is raised when this BindableList<T> changes.

public event NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler CollectionChanged

DisabledChanged

An event which is raised when Disabled's state has changed (or manually via triggerDisabledChange(bool)).

[CanBeNull]
public event Action<bool> DisabledChanged
